title: Violence on Vacation Boxed Set: Caribbean Cruise Cozy Mystery, Books 4 - 6 (Caribbean Cruise Cozy Mystery Boxed Set Book 2)
features: Three cozy mysteries from International Bestselling Author Susan Harper

After a rocky start to cruise season, the Caribbean Honey is looking to return to normal. When a new excursion offered to guests goes horribly wrong, Hope finds herself in the middle of another mystery. Then she gets stranded on a deserted island with a murderer on the loose. And finally, someone turns up dead after a lover’s quarrel. Can she keep her head and find these killers or is she destined to be lost at sea?The

contains books four, five, and six in the Caribbean Cruise Cozy Mystery series. If you like fast-paced mysteries with interesting characters, exotic locations, and unexpected twists, you’re going to love the Caribbean Cruise Cozy Mystery series.Included stories:
and sail away with three entertaining cozy mysteries today!
description: Susan Harper is a cozy mystery author with a good collection of series to her name. The international best-selling author has close to 80 published works, and all indications are that there is more to come in the future. Harper is talented in creating believable characters that most readers can identify with and simple storylines that are easy to follow. The Texas-born author is most celebrated for her Backroom Bookstore and Caribbean Cruise Cozy series.
